sys_ui_message.key: This Action will search for records on the corresponding table and return them. The value returned can be used in Script steps as an iterable GlideRecord or in For Each statements.
sys_ui_message.message: This Action will search for records on the corresponding table and return them. The value returned can be used in Script steps as an iterable GlideRecord or in For Each statements.
sys_ui_message.sys_name: This Action will search for records on the corresponding table and return them. The value returned can be used in Script steps as an iterable GlideRecord or in For Each statements.
